entry.title: Monday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain ending late this evening then cloudy. A few flurries beginning before morning. Fog patches developing early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries changing to a few rain showers in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
